title: Cajun Steak Pasta
instructions: Cook penne pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining.
Slice planted.steak into strips and coat with Cajun seasoning. Sear in a hot pan with olive oil for 3-4 minutes until charred. Set aside.
In the same pan, saut√© sliced bell peppers and onions until softened, about 4 minutes.
Add minced garlic, then pour in heavy cream and bring to a simmer. Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted.
Add the cooked pasta and toss to coat, adding pasta water as needed to reach desired consistency.
Top with the Cajun steak strips, garnish with fresh parsley, and serve immediately.
